knimeNode.name: XML Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Writes XML Documents in a directory.

fullDescription.intro: The node takes the XML Documents of the selected column and writes them, each in a separate file, into a directory. The files will be named by the table's row ids.
fullDescription.option: The column containing the XML cells.
Choose if existing files should be overwritten here. If this option is unchecked, the node will fail if a file already exists.

ports.inPort: Input table containing at least one XML column.
